page.title: 20RECREATION IN PERTH
page.content: As the{RIVER TAY}is one of the best {SALMON}rivers in Scotland, fishing enthusiasts descend on the Tay in Autumn to ply for salmon as they make their way upriver. A beat on the Tay may cost up to Â£2,000 per week, but a trout permit can be obtained for only Â£2. Perth also boasts several other sports establishments including the Ice Rink, Squash Courts and{SWIMMING {BATHS.}The pool is inadequate for present demands so a new pool is now under construction. PUPILS INVOLVED IN DOMESDAY PROJECT: {J.ALLARDYCE,K.BISSETT,R.CLASPER, {A.CUNNINGHAM,J.DOWIE,A.HARDIE,J.HOAD, {D.HIGGINS,R.KING,F.LOUDON,L.MOIR, {A.McINTYRE,R.MARSLAND,D.ROBERTSON, {S.SCOTT,G.WILLIAMS. STAFF: Mr.I.HOGG Mrs.M.M.WATT Dr. J. LAMB 26 June 1985.
